title: Manga Sekai Mukashibanashi (Manga Fairy Tales of the World)
synopsis: Each episode of this series tells the story of a famous fairy tale from all around the world. Some of them are adapted from famous books such as "The Iliad".
staff: [['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Character Design']], ['Kawajiri, Yoshiaki', ['Episode Director', ' Principle Drawing', ' Character Design', ' Background Art', ' Key Animation']], ['Ishiguro, Noboru', ['Episode Director']], ['Takahashi, Ryousuke', ['Episode Director']]]
